nodes.title: Rare Stripes
nodes.content: The world is on the brink of losing wild tigers. A century ago there were over 100,000 wild tigers; today there are as few as 3,900 wild tigers in the world. This shocking population decline is caused by rampant poaching and rapid habitat loss – threats that wild tigers continue to face today. To save […]
